page.title: 12Farming-Comm.-Lofthillock
page.content: The farm of Lofthillock in the south east of our block is one part of a large unit of 1,300 acres owned by the Mitchell family for the last 29 years. As Lofthillock is the unit nearest the town of Inverurie a large part of the acreage is used to grow vegetables to supply their shop in the town. They grow Swedes, Carrots, Cabbages, Brussel Sprouts, Cauliflower, Peas and different varieties of potatoes. The other main crops are grass, spring and winter barley and winter wheat. These crops are grown in rotation with other units outwith our area. The main building at Lofthillock houses a huge grain drier and animal food mixer. The grain from all the farms comes here to be dried and to be mixed with vitamins and mineral additives to feed their 800 cattle.
